QuestData.Title: Penny From Heaven
QuestData.Description:
<Durotan looks at you curiously.>
Those from your world are not much for subtlety, are they?
Go on ahead and greet our new companion. We will join you as soon as we can make ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Penny Clobberbottom at Beastwatch.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, there y'are!$b$bPenny Clobberbottom reportin' for duty, commander.
